languages.text: "Но вместо этого я дам вам шанс исправиться. Делом послужить Простору, доказать свои экстраординарные таланты и снять с себя претензии... Хотя бы их часть. Это очень щедрый и очень редкий шанс, цените его".

"But instead, I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself. To serve me and therefore the Imperium, to demonstrate your extraordinary talents, and to dispel the doubts surrounding you... at least partly. This is a most generous and rare opportunity. Do not squander it."
languages.original_text: "Но вместо этого я дам вам шанс исправиться. Делом послужить Простору, доказать свои экстраординарные таланты и снять с себя претензии... Хотя бы их часть. Это очень щедрый и очень редкий шанс, цените его".

traits.locale_text: "But instead, I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself. To serve the Expanse, to demonstrate your extraordinary talents, and to dispel the doubts surrounding you... at least partly. This is a most generous and rare opportunity. Do not squander it."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "But instead, I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself. To serve the Expanse, to demonstrate your extraordinary talents, and to dispel the doubts surrounding you... at least partly. This is a most generous and rare opportunity. Do not squander it."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "But instead, I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself. To serve the Expanse, to demonstrate your extraordinary talents, and to dispel the doubts surrounding you... at least partly. This is a most generous and rare opportunity. Do not squander it."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "But instead, I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself. To serve me and therefore the Imperium, to demonstrate your extraordinary talents, and to dispel the doubts surrounding you... at least partly. This is a most generous and rare opportunity. Do not squander it."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “但我却不打算这么做，我要给你一个自我救赎的机会。为我服务，为帝国服务，让所有人看到你非凡的才能，消除其他人对你的怀疑……至少消除一部分怀疑吧。这是个慷慨而难得的机会，别把它浪费了。”
languages.original_text: "But instead, I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself. To serve me and therefore the Imperium, to demonstrate your extraordinary talents, and to dispel the doubts surrounding you... at least partly. This is a most generous and rare opportunity. Do not squander it."

traits.locale_text: “但我却不打算这么做，我要给你一个自我救赎的机会。为我服务，为帝国服务，让所有人看到你非凡的才能，消除其他人对你的怀疑……至少消除一部分怀疑吧。这是个慷慨而难得的机会，别把它浪费了。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «En vez de eso, le ofrezco la oportunidad de redimirse. De servirme a mí y por lo tanto al Imperium, de demostrar sus extraordinarios talentos y de disipar las sospechas respecto a su persona... al menos parcialmente. Es una oportunidad singular y extremadamente generosa. No la desaproveche».
languages.original_text: "But instead, I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself. To serve me and therefore the Imperium, to demonstrate your extraordinary talents, and to dispel the doubts surrounding you... at least partly. This is a most generous and rare opportunity. Do not squander it."

traits.locale_text: «En vez de eso, le ofrezco la oportunidad de redimirse. De servirme a mí y por lo tanto al Imperium, de demostrar sus extraordinarios talentos y de disipar las sospechas respecto a su persona... al menos parcialmente. Es una oportunidad singular y extremadamente generosa. No la desaproveche».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「だが、その代わりに汚名を挽回するチャンスを与えてやろう。私、そして帝国に仕えるため、お前の並外れた才を示すため、そしてお前を囲む疑惑の…少なくとも一部を晴らすためだ。この上なく寛大にして滅多にない機会だ。無駄にするなよ」
languages.original_text: "But instead, I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself. To serve me and therefore the Imperium, to demonstrate your extraordinary talents, and to dispel the doubts surrounding you... at least partly. This is a most generous and rare opportunity. Do not squander it."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、その代わりに汚名を挽回するチャンスを与えてやろう。私、そして帝国に仕えるため、お前の並外れた才を示すため、そしてお前を囲む疑惑の…少なくとも一部を晴らすためだ。この上なく寛大にして滅多にない機会だ。無駄にするなよ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Mais je préfère vous donner une chance de vous racheter. De vous mettre à mon service, et par extension à celui de l'Imperium, de faire montre de vos talents extraordinaires et de dissiper les doutes vous concernant... en partie, du moins. C'est une chance rare et plus que généreuse. Ne la gaspillez pas. »
languages.original_text: "But instead, I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself. To serve me and therefore the Imperium, to demonstrate your extraordinary talents, and to dispel the doubts surrounding you... at least partly. This is a most generous and rare opportunity. Do not squander it."

traits.locale_text: « Mais je préfère vous donner une chance de vous racheter. De vous mettre à mon service, et par extension à celui de l'Imperium, de faire montre de vos talents extraordinaires et de dissiper les doutes vous concernant... en partie, du moins. C'est une chance rare et plus que généreuse. Ne la gaspillez pas. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Stattdessen gebe ich Euch eine Chance zur Wiedergutmachung. Um mir und damit dem Imperium zu dienen, Eure außergewöhnlichen Talente zu beweisen und die Zweifel an Euch zu beseitigen ... zumindest teilweise. Diese Gelegenheit ist überaus großzügig und selten. Verspielt sie nicht."
languages.original_text: "But instead, I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself. To serve me and therefore the Imperium, to demonstrate your extraordinary talents, and to dispel the doubts surrounding you... at least partly. This is a most generous and rare opportunity. Do not squander it."

traits.locale_text: "Stattdessen gebe ich Euch eine Chance zur Wiedergutmachung. Um der Ausdehnung zu dienen, Eure außergewöhnlichen Talente zu beweisen und die Zweifel an Euch zu beseitigen ... zumindest teilweise. Diese Gelegenheit ist überaus großzügig und selten. Nutzt sie wohlweislich."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ama ben sana ikinci bir şans veriyorum. Bana ve İmparatorluk'a hizmet etmen, olağanüstü becerilerini sergilemen ve şahsını saran şüpheleri bir nebze olsun asılsıza çıkarman için bir şans... Bu, cömertçe ve ender bir fırsattır. Tepmeyesin."
languages.original_text: "But instead, I am giving you a chance to redeem yourself. To serve me and therefore the Imperium, to demonstrate your extraordinary talents, and to dispel the doubts surrounding you... at least partly. This is a most generous and rare opportunity. Do not squander it."
